<fixed_copy>
**Subject: Compliance Review: Onboarding Materials & Investment Plan**

Hi [REDACTED:NAME],

We have reviewed your onboarding materials. Please find our required revisions and recommendations below to ensure compliance with the SEC Marketing Rule (Rule 206(4)-1) and the Investment Advisers Act of 1940.
